title: big problem
body: so i keep getting disconnected from pvp.net idk why ( my firewall is off ), Which causes me to miss alot of queue accepting, Does anyone have a fix please? it takes longer time for me to get in a game

replies.body:
There may be other network settings that are preventing your client from establishing a stable connection to PvP.net. I strongly recommend working through the remaining steps in our [network troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are A-Okay.

Let me know if you continue to have issues with this.
